'''Mini Durin''', originally named '''Durin''', is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] who appeared in ''[[Summertide Scales and Tales]]''. 

He is given the name "Mini Durin" by [[Alice]].<ref name='untilend'>{{Ref/Quest|Until the End of the World}}</ref>

==Profile==
He is a dragon in the world of [[Simulanka]] created by the witch [[Andersdotter]] of the [[Hexenzirkel]]. He was modeled after the real world dragon of the [[Durin|same name]].<ref name='untilend' />

He was blessed by the [[Nilou|Forest Fairy]], [[Navia|King of Constellation Metropole]], [[Kirara|Nekomata-in-Boots]], [[Wanderer|Hero of Simulanka]], and the [[Traveler]] to be what he is today. He apologized to the residents of Simulanka with the [[Wanderer]] and then headed to [[Teyvat]].

===Appearance===
He resembles a small flying dragon with red eyes and blue skin.
